title: FAIRification of Genomic Tracks JSON Schema - Experiment

@schema.description: The JSON schema absolute URL. Used for link JSON data to a particular version of the JSON schema. Must match the value of 'id' in the linked schema

global_id.description: Global experiment identifier, resolvable by identifiers.org

local_id.description: Submitter-local identifier (within investigation/hub) for experiment (in CURIE-format, if applicable)

study_ref.description: Reference to the study that generated the sample (using the submitter-local identifier of the study)

sample_ref.description: Reference to the sample of the experiment (using the submitter-local identifier of the sample)

aggregated_from.description: References to external experiments used as basis for aggregated data generation (using global experiment identifiers, resolvable by identifiers.org)

technique.description: Main technique used in experiment (e.g., laboratory, computational or statistical technique)

term_url.description: URL linking to an OBI ontology term

term_value.description: Exact value according to the OBI ontology

target.description: Main target of experiment, e.g. antibody/disease/gene/... [Needs more details]

term_url.description: URL linking to an ontology term

term_value.description: Exact value according to the ontology used

lab_protocol_description.description: Free-text description of lab protocol, or URL to such description

compute_protocol_description.description: Free-text description of computational protocol, or URL to such description
